fields.name: Animalism
fields.description: Affinity for and unnatural power over animals.

fields.name: Auspex
fields.description: Heightened senses, precognition and the ability to see what you should not be able to.

fields.name: Celerity
fields.description: Speed, agility and dexterity beyond mortal limitations.

fields.name: Dominate
fields.description: Overpower the minds of others and force them to your bidding.

fields.name: Protean
fields.description: Control over the body, including growing deadly claws, shapeshifting and fleshcrafting.

fields.name: Blood Sorcery
fields.description: Use the power of the blood to work magic.

fields.name: Thin-Blood Alchemy
fields.description: The thin-bloods have magic of their own...

fields.name: Oblivion
fields.description: Shadow magic and necromancy to pierce the veil.
